mapper.select: SELECT video_id, artist_id, title, description, is_exclusive, created_at, views, likes, comments_count, category_id, media_url FROM video ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( video_id, artist_id, title, description, is_exclusive, created_at, views, likes, comments_count, category_id, media_url ) VALUES ( #{videoId}, #{artistId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{isExclusive}, #{createdAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{views}, #{likes}, #{commentsCount}, #{categoryId}, #{mediaUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
